CustomField.formula:
IF (Enhancement_Partner_Margin_Renewal__c = 0, Enhancement_Attributable_Amount__c *Enhancement_Partner_Margin_Y1__c,
Enhancement_Attributable_Amount__c * IF( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Margin_Type__c , 'Initial Purchase') ,Enhancement_Partner_Margin_Y1__c , IF(ISPICKVAL(Partner_Margin_Type__c , 'Renewal'), Enhancement_Partner_Margin_Renewal__c ,0.00 )))
CustomField.label: Enhancement - Partner Margin Amount
